title: EAGLELab
text:
Early acquisition research group of the Institute of Psychology, Czech Academy of Sciences.
This webpage is work-in-progress and will be updated in the future.
More about our team

title: What we do
text: Our lab focuses on exploring early grammar and lexicon acquisition.
